titleStmt.title: SII 8.113: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 113. (A.R. No. 523 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH AND WEST WALLS OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu svasti . śrīmaṉmakāirācātirācaṉ yirācaparamecuraṉ śrīvirappiratāpa śrīvīracatacivatevamakārāyar piṟutuvirācciyam paṇṇiAruḷāniṉṟa cakāttam 1000 4 100 7 10ṉ mel cellāniṉṟa kilakacaṅkuvaṟcarattuk kaṉṉināyaṟṟu pūṟuvapakṣattu pañcamiyum cukkiravāramum peṟṟa Anuṣanakṣattirattu nāḷ ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu ceṅkuṉṟakkoṭṭattup peṇṇai vaṭakarai
vāṇakoppāṭi Aṇṇānāṭu taṉiyūr tiruvaṇṇāmalai tāṉat=tilavarkaḷom toṇṭaimaṇṭalam paṭuvūrkoṭṭattuk kalavaipaṟṟu pālāṟṟukkut teṉkarai yirācanārāyaṇapuramāṉa Āṟkāṭṭil kammanāyakkappāṭikaḷil ceṉṉamanāyakkar puttiran Ūtināyakkaṟku kāṇipaṟṟu kāṇiĀṭci kalluveṭṭi kuṭuttapaṭi Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiya
ṉāyiṉāṟku tammuṭaiya Upayamāka puḻukiṉaikāppukku viṭṭa ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuc ceṅkuṉṟakoṭṭattu peṇṇai vaṭakarai narippaḷḷināṭu Eṭuttavanallūr nāḷatumutal tām kāṇippaṟṟu kāṇiyāṭciyāka kaiykkoṇṭu nañcai puñcai nāṟpārkkellaiyum tām veṇṭum payir ceytukoṇṭu Ituk kuṇṭāṉa poṉmutal kāṇikkai
kaṭṭāyam Āṟṟukkāl Ūttukkāl māvaṭai maravaṭai cekkoṭṭu taṟikkaṭamai Epperppaṭṭa cakala Upātikaḷum tāṉamāṉiyam niṅkalāka celavākki mutalākiṟa mutalum malaiyāṅkaṭṭu kuttakai vāṭāvoṭṭu rekaiyāka Oṉṟukku nel mutal l Inta poṉ vāṅki celut=tinatuk=ku koyilkeṭku mutaliyārku 5 � 10 5 Inta poṉ patiṉaiñcum
toṟu puḻutiṉaikāppukku celutti taravu vāṅkikkoḷḷakkaṭavarākavum . Intakāṇiyāl kāṇiĀṭci yivaṟku puttirapavuttirapāramparaiyāka cantirātittavaraiyum Aṉupavittukkoḷḷa varkku tāṉataṉmaparikkirayaṅkaḷuk=kum Urittāka kaṭavatākavum kāṇiyāka paṇṇi kuṭuttom Ūtināyakkaṟku tāṉattilavarkaḷom . yituk=ku Akutam paṇṇiṉavaṉ keṅkaikaraiyilk kurāl pacuvaik ko
A few letters are wanting at the end of the inscription.
Digital edition of SII 8.113 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
